thread.title: Shirley Long
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 Shirley Long

author: Shirley Long
title: Shirley Long
text: My order 23236974 was sent on ist November arrived in Australia but was lost after that, despite numerous enquiries they cnnot be found, Banggood has arranged to replace these free of charge- where would you get that kindof service anywhere else. I havehad lots of items fromGolf Cart covers to clothing and shoes all have been in first class condition,perfect fit and arrived promptly, My vote goes to Banggod any time.
